trigger.title: Trigger: Item Durability Changed
trigger.description: Triggers after any item in the inventory has been damaged in any form.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

delta.title: Delta
delta.description: The change in durability (negative numbers are used to indicate a decrease in durability).

durability.title: Durability
durability.description: The remaining durability of the item.

item.title: Item
item.description: The item before it was damaged, allows you to check the durability before the item was damaged.
